articles.title: Decision on Opening WPK Seventh Congress Issued
articles.content:
Decision on Opening WPK Seventh Congress Issued
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Tuesday made public the following decision on opening the Seventh Congress of the WPK:
					 The provincial conferences of the Workers' Party of Korea took place successfully at an emotion-charged time when the might of the great Paektusan nation led by First Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Un is displayed on the highest level and all the servicepersons and people of the country are stepping up the 70-day campaign of loyalty at the final stage.
					
					 The conferences proudly reviewed the victorious course the provincial committees of the WPK had covered under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il after its Sixth Congress and elected new leadership bodies of the provincial party committees.
					
					 The conferences elected as a delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who has strengthened the WPK into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and enhanced its leading ability in every way, fully displaying the dignity and might of Juche Korea.
					
					 They elected and nominated as delegates and observers to the WPK Seventh Congress those officials and other party members, who have fully displayed their intense loyalty and patriotic devotion to the development of the Party and the building of a thriving nation, and strikingly demonstrated the unshakable faith and iron will of all party members and people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu, following Kim Jong Un under the unfurled flags bearing the immortal smiling images of the great leaders.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK decides to open the Seventh Congress of the WPK in Pyongyang on May 6, 2016.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Yong Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Yong Sun
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Ri Yong Sun, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by personages of Russia, Qatar and Kuwait on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gifts were conveyed to the DPRK ambassadors and officials concerned who are working in the relevant countries by the chief of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, the general manager of the Stroy Complex Co Ltd. of Russia, the general manager of the Jeff Co. Ltd. of Russia, the general manager of the Cougar Contract Company of Qatar, the director of the Fardan Currency Exchange in Industrial Development Area of Qatar and the general manager of the Ahmadi Contract and Trade Company of Kuwait between March 30 and April 21.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) on April 22.
					 The letter said that Marshal Kim Jong Un did not stop his journey for Songun leadership and love for the people even on the holiday of April to carry forward the sacred revolutionary careers and immortal history of the great leaders in the socialist motherland. It went on:
					
					 The Marshal saw to it that events for the Day of the Sun were significantly held on the highest level, the letter said, adding that under his leadership and care the holiday of April was celebrated as the grand political and cultural art festival in praise of the exploits of the great leaders and the spring festival for their immortality.
					
					 The Marshal sent a congratulatory message to Korean University on its 60th founding anniversary and made sure that educational aid fund and stipend were remitted to Koreans in Japan true to the intention of the great leaders.
					
					 The letter praised Kim Jong Un as destiny and future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and symbol of victory and glory of the most powerful Paektusan nation.
					
					 It expressed the will to fully demonstrate the might of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan which grew up under the care of the great leaders this historic year in which the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea will be held.

articles.title: Greetings to Togolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Togolese President
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, president of the Republic of Togo, on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the Togolese president and people bigger successes in the work for achieving the country's socio-economic progress, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow strong.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Blasts U.S. New "Sanctions Doctrine"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Blasts U.S. New "Sanctions Doctrine"
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Wednesday as the U.S. has come out with new "sanctions doctrine":
					 Officials of the U.S. administration including those of the Treasury Department have suggested so-called "sanctions doctrine" to ratchet up the sanctions and pressure on other countries.
					
					 Throughout history the U.S., regarding sanctions as a major means for pursuing its foreign policy for aggression, deliberately wielded a sanctions stick against those countries and people disobedient to it in defiance of international law, thereby inflicting untold pain and misfortune upon them.
					
					 The "sanctions doctrine" advocated by the U.S. is the evil "doctrine" that can be produced only in the U.S., the hotbed of high-handed and arbitrary practices, as it is a collection of mean methods for bringing into submission those countries and their people courting its displeasure.
					
					 The gap between the rich and the poor is widening and the social inequality and conflict are festering with each passing day and people suffer from unemployment and economic difficulty. Moreover, innocent people fall victim to shooting sprees for the mere reason that they hurt one's feelings. This is daily occurrence in the U.S.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the U.S. to invent the "sanctions doctrine" to impose pain on others, far from minding its own business.
					
					 It is foolhardy for the daily declining U.S. to resort to sanctions against other countries. What matters here is that the U.S. sanctions have become a root cause of unreasonable pressure, inequality, tensions and stand-off in the international relations.
					
					 Countries in Asia, Africa and Latin America hit by U.S. sanctions stick should destroy the cesspool of high-handed and arbitrary practices in unity in order to stop the bigger disaster that may be caused by the evil "doctrine".

articles.title: Lao Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Lao Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions headed by President of its Central Committee Pan Noymany who is member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where the historic data and relics showing the revolutionary activities of the President and his family members are displayed.
					
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President.
					
					 They went round revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, etc.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Nampho
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Nampho
Nampho, April 27 (KCNA) -- The artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe on a tour of local areas began its performance in Nampho City on April 25.
					 The performance started with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were female trio "We Have Planted Apple Trees on Mountains", female quartet "Song of Friendship" and other numbers.
					
					 Female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and female duet "His Humanity" truthfully represented the reverence of the service personnel and people of the DPRK for supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by female solo and pangchang  "Where Are You, Dear General?", an immortal classic masterpiece, as it helped them recollect the revolutionary careers of the peerlessly great men who brought about new changes by giving field guidance to various parts of the city including Taean, Kangson and Chongsan Plain.
					
					 Female solo and pangchang "It Is Offensive" and light music "Higher and Faster" greatly encouraged the citizens of Nampho dashing toward the final victory of the 70-day campaign.
					
					 Among the audience were workers of the Taean Heavy Machine Complex, peasants of Chongsan-ri and other working people and officials in the city.

articles.title: Technology of Collecting Waste Gas Newly Developed
articles.content:
Technology of Collecting Waste Gas Newly Developed
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A research group of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering in the DPRK recently developed the technology of collecting waste gas. 
					 The group succeeded in making a new absorbent which proved effective in collecting waste gas from a production process of the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 In keeping with the success, the complex set up a process of collecting waste gas by manufacturing new equipment, which is helpful to proving workers with better working conditions.

articles.title: Industrial Establishments in Pyongyang Fulfill Production Quotas
articles.content:
Industrial Establishments in Pyongyang Fulfill Production Quotas
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, 270-odd industrial establishments in Pyongyang fulfilled their production quotas for the 70-day campaign and the first half of the year ahead of schedule.
					 Silk reelers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill over-fulfilled their daily quotas 200 to 250 percent. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326 carried out its production plans of insulated wire and electric rode for the first half of this year, while the Aeguk Knitwear Factory improved the quality of products and boosted production.
					
					 The same is true of the Pyongyang Coal-mining Machine Factory, Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, Ryuwon Shoes Factory, Taedonggang Battery Factory, etc.
					
					 Meanwhile, the targets for the 70-day campaign were also hit by the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Pyongyang Children's Knitted Goods Factory, Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory, Pyongyang Bearing Factory and others. 
					
					 These achievements clearly show that the final victory is in store for the DPRK people who are advancing under the self-development-first banner.

articles.title: American Commentator Criticizes U.S. Policy Hostile to DPRK
articles.content:
American Commentator Criticizes U.S. Policy Hostile to DPRK
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Stephen Gowans, an American political commentator, recently posted on a website a commentary titled "Why UN sanctions against North Korea are wrong - What the U.S. really wants is not the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula but the Americanization of the Korean peninsula."
					 The commentary notes:
					
					 North Korea has conducted four nuclear tests and launched six rockets capable of carrying satellites into orbit, which the United States has called disguised ballistic missile tests.
					
					 Why is North Korea singled out, while the United States and a number of its allies continue to test rocket technology and bolster their nuclear arsenals?
					
					 There are no legitimate grounds which justify the March 2, 2016 round of sanctions the Security Council imposed on North Korea.
					
					 Giving a detailed account of the fact that North Korea, which had joined the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT) in 1985, exited the treaty to cope with the nuclear attack threat posed by the United States, the commentary says: Witnessing the demise of the Soviet Union and what happened in Iraq and Libya, North Korea came to realize that the U.S. nuclear blackmail should be countered with substantial countermeasures, not with compromise or retreat.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is ironic that the five permanent members of the UNSC, which are all modernizing their nuclear stockpiles, have imposed new sanctions on North Korea to punish it for doing the same.
					
					 To say nothing of the satellite launch, the Security Council, in passing a resolution imposing sanctions on Pyongyang for its satellite launch, has acted ultra vires beyond its authority.
					
					 The United States called the DPRK "one of the most brutal regimes the world has ever known" but the U.S is truly one of the most brutal regimes the world has ever known.
					
					 The pretext for singling North Korea out for sanction is that it is a threat but the real purpose is to justify the continuing US aggression against a country that refuses to give up public ownership and economic planning or surrender its political and economic sovereignty to the United States.

articles.title: WPK's Cause Is Sure to Triumph: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
WPK's Cause Is Sure to Triumph: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial says that the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea is sure to triumph as it is advancing by dint of single-minded unity.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The single-minded unity is a proud tradition of the Korean revolution and the strongest weapon of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Thanks to the purest and strongest unity based on the monolithic ideology and the single center, our revolution could advance victoriously while exploring the untrodden path of the history and our country demonstrated before the world its dignity and might as a fortress of independence and invincible socialist bulwark which no formidable enemy dares provoke.
					
					 Ours is the society pervaded with the love shown for the people by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il  who found themselves among the people all their lives, regarding believing in the people as in Heaven as their maxims. There started the sacred history of single-minded unity in which the leader believed in the people while they absolutely trusted and followed him and it is given steady continuity.
					
					 As the army and people hold in high esteem Marshal Kim Jong Un who takes care of them and devotes himself to them just as they did the great leaders, our revolutionary ranks have grown strong to be units of comrades and those of comrades-in-arms sharing destiny with him and the invincible tradition is given steady continuity.
					
					 No force on earth can prevent the army and people of the DPRK from dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism in arm with Kim Jong Un and shoulder to shoulder with him, singing the song "Green Pine on Nam Hill" which reflects the spirit of national independence, indomitable revolutionary spirit and the idea of uninterrupted revolution.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Final Choice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Final Choice
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign media are giving wide publicity to the sci-technological successes made by the DPRK in the field of national defence.
					 The British Sky News TV Broadcasting Service and the VOA said the DPRK opened to public the scene of the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of inter-continental ballistic rocket, adding that this proves that the DPRK had access to the ICBM with greater jetting power and longer flying distance. So far the DPRK has opened to public one by one that it rounded off the miniaturized nuclear warheads and atmospheric reentry technology and those help understand that it is a nuclear weapons state both in name and reality, they noted.
					
					 The Bulgarian Telegraph Agency and the Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings LTD., Hong Kong, China said that the DPRK came to make another sort of nuclear attack on the hostile forces through its great success in the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of inter-continental ballistic rocket and this means a strong message to the U.S.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says that the above-said reports are the correct views on the reality today when the balance of force between the DPRK and the U.S. has undergone a dramatic change.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 If the U.S. dares provoke the DPRK in disregard of the reality, it will only meet the catastrophic disaster in which its land may be reduced to debris by the latter's nuclear strike of justice.
					
					 There is only the final option for the U.S. which has turned down all the patient proposals of the DPRK for peace. It is the strategic option which is either finally putting an end to its hostile policy toward the DPRK or facing the latter's nuclear strike.
					
					 What is clear is that if the U.S. persistently pursues its hostile policy toward the DPRK, the latter is compelled to take the counter measures for self-defence and the U.S. mainland is bound to be exposed to a nuclear disaster and the day of its ruin on our planet is also bound to come earlier.

articles.title: Minju Joson Dismisses Japanese Reactionaries' False Propaganda about DPRK's Launch of Satellites
articles.content:
Minju Joson Dismisses Japanese Reactionaries' False Propaganda about DPRK's Launch of Satellites
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Institute for Globalization of Canada confuted with concrete facts Japan's claim that the DPRK's satellite launch was the "launch of the long-range ballistic missile" and sneered at Japanese who are reporting the Japanese government's assertion as it is for their lack of common sense about missile.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is the deserved accusation against Japan apt to talk rubbish about everything done by the DPRK with a jaundiced eye.
					
					 The earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 launched by the DPRK in last February is going round the earth along its orbit and the U.S. also officially admitted the former's satellite launch two hours after its launch.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries brand the DPRK's satellite as "long-range ballistic missile". Their ulterior aim is to float the fiction about "missile threat" from the DPRK in a bid to stir up hostility towards the DPRK throughout Japan and cunningly use it for realizing the wild ambition for militarist overseas expansion.
					
					 This ambition, however, can never come true. The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to think twice about the consequences to be entailed by their reckless acts of militarizing their country and leading it to a war and halt at once such foolish act as doing harm to their political fate.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Using Even Human Scum for Stay in Power
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Using Even Human Scum for Stay in Power
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- South Korean media including newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News and magazine News Journal condemned the puppet group for using even human scum for maintaining the conservative regime.
					 According to them, at the outset of the year Chongwadae instructed the "Oboi Yonhap" ill-famed for being an ultra-conservative body through the executive officer of its office of the chief secretary for political affairs to hold a meeting supporting the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 It also let the "National Businessmen's Association" (Jongyongryon), the group of plutocrats, and other organization to provide funds to the above-said body.
					
					 It was newly disclosed that the amount of the funds the body received from Jongyongryon in the name of "operation fund" from September to November, 2014 reached 120 million won. 
					
					 South Koreans of different circles are strongly demanding a thorough probe to clarify those behind the force misleading the public opinion, gagging people and blindfolding their eyes.

articles.title: Ruling Party's Defeat in Election Was Attributable to Chief Executive's Misrule: S. Korean Public
articles.content:
Ruling Party's Defeat in Election Was Attributable to Chief Executive's Misrule: S. Korean Public
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Kukmin Ilbo on April 21 and 23 conducted an opinion poll on the reason why the south Korean ruling party was defeated in the "National Assembly" election.
					 A majority of the respondents said that the defeat was attributable to Park Geun Hye's misrule rather than the ruling party's "wrong nomination of candidates."
					
					 The heavy defeat of the ruling "Saenuri Party" can be viewed as a severe punishment meted out by the south Korean public to traitor Park Geun Hye for three years of her autocratic rule.

articles.title: Soldier of S. Korean Marine Corps Meets Death
articles.content:
Soldier of S. Korean Marine Corps Meets Death
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- An artillery piece of the 1st Division of the south Korean puppet Marine Corps Monday collapsed at a tactical drill ground in Southern District of Phohang City, North Kyongsang Province, leaving a soldier dead and putting another in a critical condition, according to the south Korean CBS.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Australia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Australia
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- An Australian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated on April 15.
					 Neil Fitzgerald, national chairman of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Uganda
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Uganda
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Kampala on April 21.
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, the third deputy prime minister and minister of East African Affairs, was elected honorary chairman of the preparatory committee and Henry Masiko, department director of the Presidency and director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize significant political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and conduct activities to support the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving an independent and peaceful reunification of the country on the important days in 2017.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for Congratulating 7th Congress of WPK Formed by Beninese Party
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for Congratulating 7th Congress of WPK Formed by Beninese Party
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for congratulating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was formed in Cotonou on April 21.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a meeting, lecture, photo exhibition and other diverse political and cultural events on the threshold of the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Russia, Germany and Angola on March 31 and April 5 in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The chairman of the Executive Committee of the Nakhodka City Branch of the Maritime Territory of the United Russia Party said President Kim Il Sung was a prominent statesman as he, with his independent politics, wisely led the Korean people to steadily advance along the road of their choice in defiance of hardships.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said the Korean people revered the President as the founder of socialist Korea and benevolent father and always remembered him.
					
					 Angolan speakers introduced the servicepersons and people of the DPRK who are reliably defending the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world by categorically smashing the provocations of the U.S. and other hostile forces.

articles.title: Foreigners Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreigners Praise Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Angola, Mali, South Africa and Austria between April 11 and 20 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 84th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The general director of the Emproe Company of Angola gave a lecture under the title of "Great exploits President Kim Il Sung performed for cause of human independence", in which he praised the President, founder of the immortal Juche idea, as the outstanding statesman, people's leader and great leader recognized by the world.
					
					 He noted the President victoriously led the Korean revolution with his extraordinary leadership art and greatly encouraged the cause of human independence.
					
					 The chief of the Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna said the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have developed into a matchless army capable of defeating any formidable enemy at one blow under the guidance of the great leaders and have Marshal Kim Jong Un at the helm, reliably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Censured
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Stifle DPRK Censured
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea released a statement on April 13. 
					 Recalling the U.S. revealed its scenario to stifle the DPRK at the 4th "Nuclear Security Summit", the statement said the purpose of the U.S. is to stifle socialist Korea bolstering its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Today the DPRK is stepping up the building of a thriving socialist nation with dignity, steadily bolstering its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 For fear of the ever-increasing might of the DPRK, the U.S. has moved overtly and covertly to check its advance.
					
					 As it doesn't like the DPRK's development of space science and technology, it is terming the latter's satellite launch an ICBM test, a far-fetched assertion.
					
					 On this occasion, we congratulate the great and fraternal Korean people and lodge a protest against the moves of the U.S. government to monopolize space.
					
					 The U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK are a big threat to humankind.
					
					 All peoples in the world should remain alert to the moves of the U.S. resorting to a series of sanctions and other moves to stifle the DPRK in a bid to hamstring the efforts of the Korean people for achieving the final victory.

articles.title: Seminar Held in Czech Republic to Praise Party Leadership Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Seminar Held in Czech Republic to Praise Party Leadership Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building and leading the party was held in Prague on April 19 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the seminar were permanent members of the Party Central Committee and other members of the party leadership and local party officials.
					
					 General Secretary of the Party Central Committee Iri Vabr said in a speech that President Kim Il Sung carried out the historic cause of founding the party after the liberation of Korea and developed the WPK into the general staff of the revolution and guide of the people.
					
					 It is the greatest exploit of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il that they developed the WPK into an invincible party, he stressed.
					
					 Permanent Member of the Party Central Committee Iri Grunbauer gave his impression of his visit to the DPRK as follows:
					
					 I saw the invincible might of the WPK in the DPRK people's all-out struggle to carry out the line of the party while deeply trusting and closely following the party.
					
					 I was greatly impressed by the great exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by building the WPK into a powerful party that enjoys the absolute support from the popular masses.

articles.title: BP de CC de PTC publica resolucion sobre apertura de VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
BP de CC de PTC publica resolucion sobre apertura de VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 una resolucion de abrir el VII Congreso del PTC. 
					La resolucion senala como sigue: 
					
					En la epoca conmovedora en que se demuestra en el plano supremo el poderio de la potencia del monte Paektu bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC en el frente de la Revolucion Coreana y se desarrolla en etapa final la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad de todos los militares y civiles de todo el pais, se hicieron balances de las labores de los comites provinciales del partido y se efectuaron con exito las conferencias provinciales para elegir a los delegados al VII Congreso del PTC. 
					
					Las conferencias provinciales del partido hicieron balance con orgullo de la trayectoria victoriosa recorrida por los comites provinciales del partido bajo la sabia direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il despues del VI Congreso del PTC y eligieron los nuevos organos de la direccion del partido. 
					
					Tambien, eligieron como delegado al VII Congreso del PTC al Mariscal quien fortalecio y desarrollo el PTC como una agrupacion politica del gran Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y exalta a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea de Juche elevando por todos los medios la capacidad directiva del partido. 
					
					Y eligieron y recomendaron como delegados y observadores del VII del PTC a los funcionarios y otros militantes del partido quienes dedicaron la fidelidad sincera y la abnegacion patriotica para el fortalecimiento del partido y la construccion de la patria prospera y demostraron fehacientemente la inconmovible conviccion y la ferrea voluntad de todos los partidistas y habitantes de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu enarbolando las inmortales banderas de soles bajo la direccion del Mariscal. 
					
					El BP del CC del PTC decide inaugurar el 6 de mayo de 2016 en Pyongyang, capital de la revolucion, el VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Ri Yong Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Ri Yong Sun
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 27 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Ri Yong Sun, ex combatiente revolucionaria antijaponsa, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 27 un mensaje de felicitacion a Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, presidente de la Republica Togolesa, en ocasion del 56o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano.
					El remitente formulo votos sinceros por mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario y su pueblo para lograr el desarrollo socio-economico del pais y manifesto la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se intensificaran y se desarrollaran invariablemente.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza "doctrina de sancion" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza "doctrina de sancion" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Estados Unidos presenta una nueva "doctrina de sancion", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 27 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Ahora los personajes de la administracion norteamericana incluso el Departamento de Finanzas abogan por la supuesta "doctrina de sancion" a fin de intensificar la sancion y la presion sobre otros paises. 
					
					Historicamente, EE.UU. vino acarreando incontables sufrimientos y desgracias a muchos paises y pueblos que no le agradan esgrimiendo el garrote de sancion sin tomar en consideracion siquiera la ley internacional y tomandolo como medio principal para el cumplimiento de su politica exterior de caracter agresivo. 
					
					La infame "doctrina de sancion" la puede inventar solo EE.UU., nido del despotismo y arbitrariedades. 
					
					Esta doctrina implica los metodos intrigantes y groseros para doblegar a otros paises y naciones que no le obedecen. 
					
					En la sociedad estadounidense se agudizan cada dia mas la desigualdad social y el antagonismo entre los ricos y los pobres, los habitantes sufren la crisis de empleos y de la vida economica y las personas inocentes mueren diariamente por los ciegos disparos de armas. 
					
					Pues, es muy ridiculo que el imperio americano haya inventado la "doctrina de sancion" que atormenta a otros paises y naciones. 
					
					Es inutil la sancion de EE.UU. decadente, pero lo problematico es que la sancion de este imperio genera la injusta presion, la desigualdad, la tension y los conflictos en las relaciones internacionales. 
					
					Los paises de Asia, Africa y America Latina, que sufren bajo el garrote de sancion de EE.UU., deben tomar conciencia y unir sus fuerzas y eliminar el nido del despotismo y arbitrariedades para prevenir las catastrofes mas tragicas que se emanen de la "doctrina" de mal.

articles.title: Es invicta causa de PTC que marcha con unidad monolitica, enfatiza Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Es invicta causa de PTC que marcha con unidad monolitica, enfatiza Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Es invencible la causa del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que marcha con el poderio de la unidad monolitica, adelanta asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en el editorial publicado en su edicion de este miercoles y continua:
					La unidad monolitica es la tradicion orgullosa de la revolucion coreana y el arma todopoderosa de la potencia Paektusan. 
					
					Con esta unidad mas pura y solida basada en la unica idea y el unico centro, la revolucion coreana ha avanzado victoriosamente abriendo un camino inexplorado de la historia, y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se ha desarrollado como invicta fortaleza socialista independiente a que ningun enemigo potente se atreve a atentar. 
					
					Gracias al noble amor al pueblo de los grandes Lideres antecesores coreanos que durante toda la vida estuvieron entre el pueblo considerandolo como el cielo, empezo y continua la sagrada historia de la unidad monolitica entre el lider y el pueblo. 
					
					Gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien dedica todo lo suyo por el pueblo tratandolo en la posicion de apoyar a los grandes Lideres antecesores, nuestras filas revolucionarias se consolidan como destacamento de camaradas y companeros de armas que comparten la vida y la muerte, y continua con firmeza las invencibles tradiciones de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					Nadie puede detener la marcha vigorosa del ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC que hombro con hombro con el Mariscal, marchan a pasos firmes por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, cantando la cancion "Pino verde en el monte Nam" en que palpita el espiritu de independencia nacional, el indoblegable revolucionario y la idea de revolucion continua.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intencion malsana de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intencion malsana de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 27 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el Instituto para Globalizacion de Canada refuto con los detallados datos la insistencia de Japon en que el lanzamiento de satelite por parte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es "el de misil balistico de larga distancia" y burlo que los japoneses faltos de conocimientos elementales sobre los misiles repiten como papagayo las opiniones absurdas del gobierno.
					Esto es la evaluacion merecida dada a los nipones que sueltan solo los disparates cuestionando todos los trabajos de la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					El satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4 lanzado en febrero por parte de la RPDC, esta girando por su orbita y hasta EE.UU. lo reconocio oficialmente a las 2 horas posteriores al lanzamiento.
					
					Pero, los reaccionarios japoneses insisten sin ton ni son en que el satelite de la RPDC es el "misil balistico de largo alcance", lo cual parte del objeto de difundir el rumor de "amenaza de misiles" para inculcar la hostilidad anti-RPDC en toda la tierra japonesa y usarlo astutamente en la materializacion de la ambicion militarista de la expansion a ultramar.
					
					Pero, es irrealizable esta ambicion.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben reflexionar en las consecuencias que se emanaran de sus locuras imprudentes tendentes a militarizar el pais y guiarlo a la guerra y tienen que cesar de inmediato sus absurdidades que destruyen su destino politico.
